name: Good Morning, Dictator
description: While the country is being ravaged by civil unrest, its Dictator appears on a morning show. During “Breakfast With Tobhy” a renown host by the name of Tobhias Tobiakov asks the Dictator to share his childhood memories. Join them on the Dictator’s journey down the memory lane, where he will reminisce on his (ab)normal family, juvenile conflicts, and first love, and decide if he is indeed a Dictator, or a DICKtator after all.
